title: I have not gotten my Doom Bots icon yet
body: I played doom bots for like 6 or 7  games until i won so i could get the Doom bots icon but i have yet to get it. And my friend from the same game got it the next day.

replies.body:
It can take *up to 2 weeks* after the end of the event (Nov 3rd) for the Icon to be delivered to your account.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Okay Thank You, I guess ill keep waiting then
